cause.description:
To Write Love On Her Arms is a group that talks about addiction, depression, cutting and suicide. They let the broken, lost children of this world. That they are not alone. That there is hope. They are loved.
Remember. Love IS the movement. Rescue IS possible. I love you. tessXoXo
1. Stop The Bleeding
2. Rescue IS possible
3. Love is THE movement
cause.mission: To put our palms to the bleedings wounds of a broken world
cause.name: To Write Love On Her Arms-Stop The Bleeding
